entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch statement error recovery improvements #67757
  • Large potential memory savings if Compiler could defer realizing all members when asked for members with a specific name. #67756
  • Don't produce a "best type not found" error because of an ErrorType in a nested position #67751
    17.6
  • Roslyn emits conv.i for nuint conversion #67746
  • Ease understandability of incremental generators #67745
  • Localization issues with compiler tests #67743
    17.7
  • Change in behavior in code snippet shortcuts #67741
  • Incorrect Indentation after inserting prop or ctor semantic snippets (maybe others...) #67740
  • C# constructor semantic snippet inserts wrong line endings #67739
  • Semantic code snippet can not loop Tab #67738
  • Compiler should not produce warning for nullable type parameter in XML doc cref #67737
  • `TrackedSteps` and `TrackedOutputSteps` have same doc comment #67733

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33611.334 #67759
  • Consider warning for [StructLayout] usage with primary constructor #67162
    C# 12.0
  • C# Compiler `csc -langversion:?` cann't run on macOS #67692
  • params for ValueType array #67710

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP: Do not allocate conversion objects in common failure path #67760
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in ComputeReverseReferences #67758
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing SyntaxReference[] in source methods #67750
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache AssemblyIdentity instances produced in compiler #67749
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Source build fixes #67747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool lists used when reusing assembly symbols #67744
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Defer creation of Location objects to the point they are actually needed. #67742
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider ref property and indexer accesses to have home #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Correct generate rename code action in LSP #67731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port EnC telemetry improvements to 17.6 #67752
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • [17.6] Cache source generator node tables only if their state counts match #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Move to a SegmentedHashSet from a SegmentedDictionary #67718
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fixes imposibility of Edit and continue for methods with attributes with type #67704
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle additional diagnostic scenarios for captured primary constructor parameters #67712
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support attributes on primary constructors #67695
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Avoid creating Document instances for files that we not reanalyzing in DesignerAttribute scanning #67729
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not realize all Document instances in a solution when walking it to create/update indices #67728
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move caching of classifications to non-focus priority #67716
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • LSP Completion Handler refactoring #67726
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache the DiagnosticDescriptors produced by the C# diagnostic analyzer #67720
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Set current culture when Interactive Window is initialized #67677
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • [Draft - Help!] Generate comments as part of Extract Interface #67722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
